translations: v．煽动，激起，教唆：引起或激发某事物，尤指不好的事物。
· He instigated the workers to go on strike.
他煽动工人们举行罢工。

sentences.sentence: The govern we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  has instigated a programme of economic reform.
sentences.translation: 政府已实施了经济改革方案。

sentences.sentence: The changes I instigated in association with the board 18 months ago were because I love this company.
sentences.translation: 18个月前我联合董事会发起的这些变革是出于我爱这家公司。

sentences.sentence: So admired were these pieces that they encouraged the develop we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  of earthenware made in imitation of porcelain and instigated research into the method of their manufacture.
sentences.translation: 这些瓷器如此受人称赞，以至于鼓励了仿瓷陶器的发展，鼓励了其制造方法的研究。
